Package com.jcabi.log

Convenient logging utils.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Supplier<T>
    Functional interface used as assignment target for Java8 lambda expressions or method references.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Colors
    Store human readable color data.
    ControlSequenceIndicatorFormatted
    Replaces string format with a Control Sequence Indicator.
    Logger
    Universal logger, and adapter between your app and SLF4J API.
    MulticolorLayout
    Multi-color layout for LOG4J.
    VerboseCallable<T>
    Wrapper of Callable, that logs all uncaught runtime exceptions.
    VerboseProcess
    Utility class for getting stdout from a running process and logging it through SLF4J.
    VerboseProcess.Result
    Class representing the result of a process.
    VerboseRunnable
    Wrapper of Runnable, that logs all uncaught runtime exceptions.
    VerboseThreads
    Convenient ThreadFactory, that logs all uncaught exceptions.

Package com.jcabi.log Description

Convenient logging utils.

The only dependency you need is (check our latest version available at www.jcabi.com): 

<depedency>
   <groupId>com.jcabi</groupId>
   <artifactId>jcabi-log</artifactId>
 </dependency>
Version:
$Id: 6c6e2444b40825144a468bbf24e0b68f5b8458f5 $
Author:
Yegor Bugayenko (yegor256@gmail.com)
